## isISO8601Duration() function

Determine if the string is a proper ISO-8601 duration format.

[https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32044846/regex-for-iso-8601-durations](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/32044846/regex-for-iso-8601-durations) [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO\_8601\#Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isISO8601Duration(potential: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  potential | string | Potential ISO-8601 duration string to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

- True if the provided string is a ISO-8601 duration formatted string.
